sn19.1:4.1: * Evaṃ me sutaṃ—​
sn19.1:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn19.1:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca lakkhaṇo āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti.
sn19.1:4.4: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yenāyasmā lakkhaṇo tenupasaṅkami;
sn19.1:4.6: “āyāmāvuso lakkhaṇa, rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti.
sn19.1:4.7: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosi.
sn19.1:4.8: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
sn19.1:4.9: Atha kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca:
sn19.1:4.10: “ko nu kho, āvuso moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti?
sn19.1:4.12: Bhagavato maṃ santike etaṃ pañhaṃ pucchā”ti.
sn19.1:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā ca lakkhaṇo āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn19.1:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca:
sn19.1:5.4: “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
sn19.1:5.5: Ko nu kho, āvuso moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti?
sn19.1:6.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ.
sn19.1:6.2: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā phāsuḷantarikāhi vitudenti vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.1:7.3: ñāṇabhūtā vata, bhikkhave, sāvakā viharanti, yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā karissati.
sn19.1:7.4: Pubbeva me so, bhikkhave, satto diṭṭho ahosi, api cāhaṃ na byākāsiṃ.
sn19.1:7.5: Ahañcetaṃ byākareyyaṃ, pare ca me na saddaheyyuṃ.
sn19.1:7.6: Ye me na saddaheyyuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
sn19.1:7.7: Eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe goghātako ahosi.
sn19.1:7.8: So tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena evarūpaṃ attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ paṭisaṃvedayatī”ti.
